definitions.definition: An artifact or document rendering something allowed or legal.
definitions.example: A construction permit can be obtained from the town offices.

definitions.definition: To allow (something) to happen, to give permission for.
To allow (someone) to do something; to give permission to.
To allow for, to make something possible.
(pronounced like noun) To grant formal authorization for (something).
definitions.example: The Building Department permitted that project last week.

definitions.definition: (pronounced like noun) To attempt to obtain or succeed in obtaining formal authorization for (something).
definitions.example: We've been busy permitting the State Street development.

definitions.definition: To hand over, resign (something to someone).
A pompano of the species Trachinotus falcatus.
